  9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_FFT_NO_FFT_HPP
 10#define VSIP_CORE_FFT_NO_FFT_HPP
 11
 12#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 13#include <vsip/domain.hpp>

 17namespace vsip

 19namespace impl

 21namespace fft
 22{
 23/// Dummy backend, for testing purposes.
 24/// As the Fft_backend base class throws "unimplemented" in all its
 25/// out_of_place and in_place functions, we merely override those here
 26/// as no-ops, since this makes testing easier.
 27template <dimension_type D, typename I, typename O, int S> class No_fft;
 28
 29// 1D complex -> complex FFT
 30template <typename T, int S>
 31class No_fft<1, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, S>
 32  : public fft::Fft_backend<1, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, S>
 33{
 34public:
 35  void in_place(std::complex<T> *, stride_type, length_type) {}
 36  void in_place(std::pair<T *, T *>, stride_type, length_type) {}
 37  void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *, stride_type,
 38  		    std::complex<T> *, stride_type,
 39  		    length_type)
 40  {}
 41  void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>, stride_type,
 42		    std::pair<T *, T *>, stride_type,
 43		    length_type)
 44  {}
 45};
 46
 47// 1D real -> complex FFT
 48template <typename T>
 49class No_fft<1, T, std::complex<T>, 0>
 50  : public fft::Fft_backend<1, T, std::complex<T>, 0>
 51{
 52public:
 53  void out_of_place(T *, stride_type,
 54  		    std::complex<T> *, stride_type,
 55  		    length_type)
 56  {}
 57  void out_of_place(T *, stride_type,
 58		    std::pair<T *, T *>, stride_type,
 59		    length_type)
 60  {}
 61};
 62
 63// 1D complex -> real FFT
 64template <typename T>
 65class No_fft<1, std::complex<T>, T, 0>
 66  : public fft::Fft_backend<1, std::complex<T>, T, 0>
 67{
 68public:
 69  void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *, stride_type,
 70  		    T *, stride_type,
 71  		    length_type)
 72  {}
 73  void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>, stride_type,
 74		    T *, stride_type,
 75		    length_type)
 76  {}
 77};
 78
 79// 2D complex -> complex FFT
 80template <typename T, int S>
 81class No_fft<2, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, S>
 82  : public fft::Fft_backend<2, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, S>
 83{
 84public:
 85  virtual void in_place(std::complex<T> *,
 86			stride_type, stride_type,
 87			length_type, length_type)
 88  {}
 89  virtual void in_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
 90			stride_type, stride_type,
 91			length_type, length_type)
 92  {}
 93  virtual void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *,
 94			    stride_type, stride_type,
 95			    std::complex<T> *,
 96			    stride_type, stride_type,
 97			    length_type, length_type)
 98  {}
 99  virtual void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
100			    stride_type, stride_type,
101			    std::pair<T *, T *>,
102			    stride_type, stride_type,
103			    length_type, length_type)
104  {}
105};
106
107// 2D real -> complex FFT
108template <typename T, int S>
109class No_fft<2, T, std::complex<T>, S>
110  : public fft::Fft_backend<2, T, std::complex<T>, S>
111{
112public:
113  void out_of_place(T *,
114  		    stride_type, stride_type,
115  		    std::complex<T> *,
116  		    stride_type, stride_type,
117  		    length_type, length_type)
118  {}
119  void out_of_place(T *,
120		    stride_type, stride_type,
121		    std::pair<T *, T *>,
122		    stride_type, stride_type,
123		    length_type, length_type)
124  {}
125};
126
127// 2D complex -> real FFT
128template <typename T, int S>
129class No_fft<2, std::complex<T>, T, S>
130  : public fft::Fft_backend<2, std::complex<T>, T, S>
131{
132public:
133  void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *,
134  		    stride_type, stride_type,
135  		    T *,
136  		    stride_type, stride_type,
137  		    length_type, length_type)
138  {}
139  void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
140		    stride_type, stride_type,
141		    T *,
142		    stride_type, stride_type,
143		    length_type, length_type)
144  {}
145};

147// 3D complex -> complex FFT
148template <typename T, int S>
149class No_fft<3, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, S>
150  : public fft::Fft_backend<3, std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, S>
151{
152public:
153  void in_place(std::complex<T> *,
154  		stride_type,
155  		stride_type,
156  		stride_type,
157  		length_type,
158  		length_type,
159  		length_type)
160  {}
161  void in_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
162  		stride_type,
163  		stride_type,
164  		stride_type,
165  		length_type,
166  		length_type,
167  		length_type)
168  {}
169  void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *,
170  		    stride_type,
171  		    stride_type,
172  		    stride_type,
173  		    std::complex<T> *,
174  		    stride_type,
175  		    stride_type,
176  		    stride_type,
177  		    length_type,
178  		    length_type,
179  		    length_type)
180  {}
181  void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
182		    stride_type,
183		    stride_type,
184		    stride_type,
185		    std::pair<T *, T *>,
186		    stride_type,
187		    stride_type,
188		    stride_type,
189		    length_type,
190		    length_type,
191		    length_type)
192  {}
193};

195// 3D real -> complex FFT
196template <typename T, int S>

205  		    std::complex<T> *,
206  		    stride_type,
207  		    stride_type,
208  		    stride_type,
209  		    length_type,

212  {}

227// 3D complex -> real FFT
228template <typename T, int S>
229class No_fft<3, std::complex<T>, T, S>
230  : public fft::Fft_backend<3, std::complex<T>, T, S>

246		    stride_type,

258
259template <typename I, typename O, int A, int D> class No_fftm;
260
261// real -> complex FFTM
262template <typename T, int A>
263class No_fftm<T, std::complex<T>, A, fft_fwd>
264  : public fft::Fftm_backend<T, std::complex<T>, A, fft_fwd>
265{
266public:
267  void out_of_place(T *,
268  		    stride_type, stride_type,
269  		    std::complex<T> *,
270  		    stride_type, stride_type,
271  		    length_type, length_type)
272  {}
273  void out_of_place(T *,
274		    stride_type, stride_type,
275		    std::pair<T *, T *>,
276		    stride_type, stride_type,
277		    length_type, length_type)
278  {}
279};
280
281// complex -> real FFTM
282template <typename T, int A>
283class No_fftm<std::complex<T>, T, A, fft_inv>
284  : public fft::Fftm_backend<std::complex<T>, T, A, fft_inv>
285{
286public:
287  void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *,
288  		    stride_type, stride_type,
289  		    T *,
290  		    stride_type, stride_type,
291  		    length_type, length_type)
292  {}
293  void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
294		    stride_type, stride_type,
295		    T *,
296		    stride_type, stride_type,
297		    length_type, length_type)
298  {}
299};
300
301// complex -> complex FFTM
302template <typename T, int A, int D>
303class No_fftm<std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, A, D>
304  : public fft::Fftm_backend<std::complex<T>, std::complex<T>, A, D>
305{
306public:
307  void in_place(std::complex<T> *,
308  		stride_type, stride_type,
309  		length_type, length_type)
310  {}
311  void in_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
312  		stride_type, stride_type,
313  		length_type, length_type)
314  {}
315  void out_of_place(std::complex<T> *,
316  		    stride_type, stride_type,
317  		    std::complex<T> *,
318  		    stride_type, stride_type,
319  		    length_type, length_type)
320  {}
321  void out_of_place(std::pair<T *, T *>,
322		    stride_type, stride_type,
323		    std::pair<T *, T *>,
324		    stride_type, stride_type,
325		    length_type, length_type)
326  {}
327};

332
333namespace vsip_csl
334{
335namespace dispatcher
336{
337template <dimension_type D,
338	  typename I,
339	  typename O,
340	  int S,
341	  return_mechanism_type R,
342	  unsigned N>
343struct Evaluator<op::fft<D, I, O, S, R, N>, be::no_fft,
344  std::auto_ptr<impl::fft::Fft_backend<D, I, O, S> >
345  (Domain<D> const &, typename impl::Scalar_of<I>::type)>
346{
347  typedef typename impl::Scalar_of<I>::type scalar_type;
348  static bool const ct_valid = true;
349  static bool rt_valid(Domain<D> const &, scalar_type) { return true;}
350  static std::auto_ptr<impl::fft::Fft_backend<D, I, O, S> >
351  exec(Domain<D> const &, scalar_type)
352  {
353    return std::auto_ptr<impl::fft::Fft_backend<D, I, O, S> >
354      (new impl::fft::No_fft<D, I, O, S>());
355  }
356};
357
358template <typename I,
359	  typename O,
360	  int A,
361	  int D,
362	  return_mechanism_type R,
363	  unsigned N>
364struct Evaluator<op::fftm<I, O, A, D, R, N>, be::no_fft,
365  std::auto_ptr<impl::fft::Fftm_backend<I, O, A, D> > 
366  (Domain<2> const &, typename impl::Scalar_of<I>::type)>
367{
368  typedef typename impl::Scalar_of<I>::type scalar_type;
369  static bool const ct_valid = true;
370  static bool rt_valid(Domain<2> const &, scalar_type) { return true;}
371  static std::auto_ptr<impl::fft::Fftm_backend<I, O, A, D> > 
372  exec(Domain<2> const &, scalar_type)
373  {
374    return std::auto_ptr<impl::fft::Fftm_backend<I, O, A, D> > 
375      (new impl::fft::No_fftm<I, O, A, D>());
376  }
377};
378
379} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
380} // namespace vsip_csl
